EA FC 25‚Äôs servers are unpredictable at best. It doesn‚Äôt matter how good your internet connection and speed are, if the servers don‚Äôt want to play ball (literally), then there‚Äôs nothing you can do. So let‚Äôs update you with the latest EA FC 25 server status changes.

It‚Äôs happened to us at all at some point. You‚Äôre ready for an epic EA FC 25 sesh with epic tactics at the ready, and you‚Äôre met with an ‚Äúunable to connect to the EA servers‚Äù screen. EA FC 25 servers are not immune to this most frustrating issue, and I wish I could give it a red card.

We don‚Äôt need VAR to help us crack the mystery of EA FC 25‚Äôs server status though. There are a few ways to monitor the soccer title‚Äôs online servers and keep up with their latest developments.

Are EA FC 25 Servers Down?

Right now, EA FC 25 servers are not down, and they are fully operational and running without a hitch.

Our latest personal check of the EA FC 25 servers is happening now on Dec. 9, 2024. It‚Äôs not always easy to keep track of these things though, so, I‚Äôve come up with a multitude of ways you can use to keep an eye on the EA FC 25 servers.

How to Check EA FC 25 Server Status

You can use EA‚Äôs official help page, track EA‚Äôs X social media communications and EA Help channels, and keep up with people‚Äôs real-life experiences of the EA FC 25 servers for the latest information.

EA FC 25 Server Help Page

The EA Help site has tons of different answers for technical questions related to the company‚Äôs various games. One of its main uses is the live service check which tracks the online connectivity status of online EA titles.

It includes the EA App and EA Play, along with a bunch of games: Apex Legends, Battlefield 2042, EA SPORTS College Football 25, EA FC 24, EA FC 25, FIFA 23, Madden NFL 24, Madden NFL 25, NHL 24, NHL 25, STAR WARS Battlefront II, The Sims 4, and EA SPORTS UFC 5.

I would be remiss to mention this crucial line on the page though: ‚ÄúWe update this page as quickly as possible when a server goes down, but there might be delays.‚Äù Even though this is a handy source, there are other ways of checking the EA FC 25 servers we need to consider.

EA Help & EA Sports FC Communications on X

Social media site X has two different pages I think are useful for monitoring EA FC 25‚Äôs server status issues: EA Help and EA SPORTS FC Direct Communication.

EA Help is recommended by EA itself as a more up-to-date page that has the chance of being refreshed quicker than the main Server Help page.

Whereas EA SPORTS FC Direct Communication is a more general way of talking to the player base. Depending on the server status and major outages, it‚Äôs always handy to have, just in case.

People like ourselves are as relatable as anyone. If the servers are down and affecting me, there‚Äôs a good chance I‚Äôm going to complain about it. Many players take to different forms of social media to complain‚Äîinadvertently giving a live update on the situation.

This is why I‚Äôm pushing you to bookmark the EA Sports FC Reddit, as well as the Discord server. If you ignore the complaint posts about EA FC 25, there‚Äôs a lot of helpful information on these boards!

item.title: LEGO Fortnite Odyssey Replaces Original Game Mode
item.content:encoded:
https://insider-gaming.com/lego-fortnite-odyssey-replaces-original-game-mode/

LEGO Fortnite, the original survival crafting game launched in December 2023, has changed its name to LEGO Fortnite Odyssey. A new Storm Chasers update for this game mode will arrive tomorrow, December 10, along with the name change. 

Fortnite‚Äôs Discover section now has a unique LEGO Fortnite Category, where players can find Odyssey and Brick Life as the new game modes. In Odyssey, players will find that the Storm King has invaded the world, and it‚Äôs up to them and their friends to take care of him and his storm-wild legion, which Raven leads. 

LEGO Fortnite Storm Chasers Update 

Your new LEGO Fortnite Odyssey journey will begin at Storm Chaser village, where you meet characters like Carl Ruckus and Dr. Borrasca. Then, you will head out into the storms, where Storm Dungeons are located. Within these dungeons, you will find fragments of Storm King‚Äôs power that must be destroyed to loosen his control over the world. The enemies you are up against include the Acolytes, Raven and The Storm King himself. 

New Gameplay Mechanics

LEGO Fortnite Odyssey‚Äôs Storm Chasers Update also introduces a set of new gameplay mechanics. Enemy health has been balanced, along with their health and damage points. Component-based crafting has been introduced, bringing more flexibility when choosing which materials to use. The Legendary Forge is an upgrade station that you can use to take your tools to the next level. 

Moreover, other players and NPCs can now revive players to get them back into the action. There are new vehicle-guided builds, such as the ‚ÄòLil‚Äô Barge‚Äô and ‚ÄòStorm Chaser‚Äô. Lastly, LEGO Fortnite Odyssey is fully compatible with split-screen on PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Xbox Series X|S, and Xbox One. 

Check out the blog post for more details on LEGO Pass: Chill & Thrill and the Storm Chasers update.

item.title: CD Projekt Red Announces Surprise Cyberpunk 2077 Update

A new update is coming for Cyberpunk 2077. Developer CD Projekt Red announced on Monday its plans to hold a stream on Tuesday, December 10 to announce its plans for Cyberpunk 2077 Update 2.2.

December 10 just so happens to be the fourth anniversary of the game‚Äôs launch.

‚ÄúJoin us for a new episode of REDstreams, where we‚Äôll dive deep into the new features Coming Soon TM for Cyberpunk 2077 in Update 2.2,‚Äù the game‚Äôs official social media accounts posted.

‚ÄúThe team still has some gas in the tank,‚Äù CD Projekt Red Global Community Director Marcin Momot added.

Nothing else is known about what to expect in the announcement. The studio simply teased the announcement and that it was going to be, and I quote, ‚Äúüî•‚Äù.

Recently, it was confirmed that The Witcher 4 aka Project Polaris has entered full production. The next game in the franchise currently has 400 people, or 61% of the company, working on it. In addition to The Witcher 4, the studio has 64 developers currently working on the sequel to Cyberpunk 2077, currently known as Project Orion.

Lastly, in the most recent earnings report, it was announced that the game has sold over 30 million copies in four years. The game‚Äôs Phantom Liberty expansion sold 8 million copies.

item.title: LEGO Fortnite‚Äôs Brick Life Game Mode Arrives This December
item.content:encoded:
https://insider-gaming.com/lego-fortnites-brick-life-game-mode-arrives-this-december/

LEGO Fortnite has announced the arrival of a new social roleplaying game mode, Brick Life, on December 12, 2024. 

Brick Life is a new social roleplay experience set in a familiar universe. Players will be able to meet new players, explore different sights, secure their dream job, purchase a new home and much more. The latest game mode will allow players to explore a bustling city with up to 31 other players. 

LEGO Fortnite Brick Life will feature different locales and landmarks players can visit, such as The Beach, Town Square, Mourndale Academy and more. Additionally, players have a variety of jobs to choose from, such as a Fortune Teller, a Sushi Chef, a scoundrel, an academy professor and much more. Moreover, they can purchase and decorate their homes in Brick Life with various LEGO Furniture.   

To play Brick Life, players must first visit LEGO Fortnite from the ‚ÄòDiscover‚Äô section of the game. Here, players can click on the game mode to begin their new social roleplay experience. 

In other news, Hatsune Miku is seemingly coming to Fortnite in 2025. Also, check out the upcoming 5v5 first-person competitive shooter built inside Fortnite, Ballistic. What are your thoughts on LEGO Fortnite‚Äôs Brick Life game mode? Let us know in the comments or our new community forum!

https://insider-gaming.com/all-marvel-rivals-leaked-characters/

The topic of Marvel Rivals and leaked characters is unlikely to ever go away. While the community rightly lauds the current crop of heroes, everyone is keeping an eye on the next superhero to grace our screens. So, we‚Äôve taken a trip to the rumor mill, and unearthed every bit of gossip pertaining to new Marvel Rivals heroes.

Heroes were the big selling point of the Marvel Rivals launch. While Marvel is blessed with a cornucopia of iconic characters, the initial hero list could have impacted Marvel Rivals in different ways. Thankfully, players seem to be enjoying the content, and this is evident with 10 million players in Rivals‚Äô first three days.

You can‚Äôt sit around and bask in your success in the live-service market though. Times move quickly, attention spans shrink, and you need new content in the pipeline. This is where Marvel Rivals leaked characters are a big selling point of the shooters‚Äô future, and any info is helpful.

Every Marvel Rivals Leaked Character

So far, 12 new Marvel Rivals characters have leaked, and the speculated names span various Marvel franchises: Fantastic Four, The Avengers, Captain Marvel, and X-Men.

We‚Äôve already discovered Ultron and The Thing are destined for Marvel Rivals, but this is a small mackerel of what‚Äôs allegedly to come. The leaks come courtesy of various X social media sources including Marvel Rivals ‚Äî Leaks, Matfacio | Leaker of games, Miller Ross, and Fumo Leaks.

Here is every leaked Marvel Rivals character so far, and their attached Marvel franchise.

  • Angela
  • Blade
  • Captain Marvel

  • Jean Grey AKA Phoenix
  • Johnny Storm AKA Human Torch

Knull was seen in the Season 0: Dooms‚Äô Rise Official Trailer, so his debut is very likely. The rest of the rumored characters are all datamines and speculation.

In addition to these potential heroes, I‚Äôve also seen Daredevil discussed, but only in memes showing his gameplay to be nothing but a blank screen‚Äîif you know, you know. Otherwise, these 12 names are the common heroes outed by leakers, and datamines have revealed info about each including movesets and Team-Up abilities.

Interestingly, there‚Äôs still no mention of Doctor Doom‚Äîa hero we‚Äôve discussed before in great detail. The villainous Victor was the heartbeat of the No One Rivals Doom trailer on Jul. 26, and also the Dooms‚Äô Rise video. There‚Äôs still no confirmation of his arrival yet though, so we‚Äôll keep our eyes peeled.
